House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on jacquard cards and to include in the suspension plastic jacquard cards and other cards to be used as jacquard cards.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1992, the suspension of duty on certain jacquard cards. Includes other types of jacquard cards in such suspension.

titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on jacquard cards and to include in the suspension plastic jacquard cards and other cards to be used as jacquard cards.
